if [[ -f "/etc/apache2/$USER.conf" ]]
then #Apache 2 open -a TextMate "/etc/apache2/users/$USER.conf"
elif [[ -f "/private/etc/httpd/users/$USER.conf" ]]
then #Apache 1 open -a TextMate "/private/etc/httpd/users/$USER.conf"
else
exit_show_tool_tip "User configuration file not found."
fi
